FuncDef: The display vrrp admin-vrrp command displays all the configured management Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol (mVRRP) backup groups and their status on the current device.
Examples: VRID State       Interface               Type    Virtual IP        Master IP         Local IP
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display vrrp admin-vrrp command can be used to display information about all mVRRP groups. The information includes the VRRP-enabled interface, ID of the mVRRP group, and mVRRP status.
